website_summaries.verdict: This mat is reliable, inexpensive and comes in a variety of colors to fit your office decor.
pros: Provides good support for a rolling chair
Same company also makes a chair mat for hard floors and a desk mat
cons: The 30" x 48" size is a little smaller than some on the market

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will definitely buy again and recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: This pink mat completed my daughters new room. It came in a large box so it didn't have to be rolled tight which was great. I was able to lay it on the ground and it stayed flat without having to try to get it flat with heavy objects. The pink color is amazing and the mat holds on to the carpet perfectly. I plan to buy the desk mat soon! Great product, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I really hate the average plastic matt. They Always crack, crumble and cut my feet eventually. This one is decorative and I don't think it will crack like normal chair matts.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I put it under the chair in my sewing room. Thick and doesn’t crack.
customer_reviews.author: SewQuiltCreate!

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and I was honestly worried when I saw some of the reviews saying that others had received the product with missing pieces or cracks. Everything is as stated and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Defective item. It’s cracking.
customer_reviews.text: The item is cracked from side and toward the middle. If not fixed It will crack all the way through. I did not know it is defective. What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good cost, good product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the carpet mat. Some can be too floppy to provide support for a rolling chair. This one is well made and a good price. I wish I’d been able to find the matching desk mat.
customer_reviews.author: twinkle twinkle

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect so far. I hope it doesn’t crack as I only weigh 95 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Mystical1022

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home office
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing for my home office. It stayed in place and didn't crack like my last chair mat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we sent it back and the 2nd one was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: The first on we received was broken, we sent it back and the 2nd one was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Allison

customer_reviews.title: Loved the pink mat
customer_reviews.text: The color pops and adds sunshine to my work area.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Berry

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't move when the chair moves.
customer_reviews.text: Got it in pink, perfect not too bright. Also it stays put when the chair moves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pop of color in a drab office.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office and a much needed pop of color in my drab office. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: yippinmoon

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I am using this chair mat under my sewing table. My room is pink and the mat complements the room. It is as described, but since I have a 6 ft. table I will need 3. I had to put the mat with the short side to the wall in order to be able to slide under the table. It has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: AtlCatLady

product_meta.title: casa pura Office Chair Mats for Carpeted Floors - 30"x48" | Carpet Protector Floor Mat, Pink - BPA Free, Odorless | Matching Desk Mats Available
feature_bullets: RELIABLE OFFICE MAT: Strong and sturdy our polypropylene office chair mat is extremely resilient, no cracking or splitting over time. Stain resistant and easy to clean, this colorful office chair mat for carpet floors will make the perfect addition to any office, study area or teen's room.

CHAIR FLOOR PROTECTORS: These chair mats for carpeted floors were specifically designed for long-term reliable use, the studded underside will prevent the mat from slipping around beneath your chair, preventing any wear and tear on both the carpet and the mat itself.

PREMIUM CHAIR MAT: Reduce the risk of leg fatigue and poor posture by allowing your chair to move freely between tasks while protecting your carpeted floor from irreversible damage. The textured upper surface provides perfect grip for controlled rolling.

SAFE: Your office chair mat for carpeted floors is an environmentally friendly carpet protector for desk chair. It is free from BPA and PVC - Odorless for enhanced indoor air quality - it is also child-friendly.
COLOR AND CLEAR CHAIR MAT: Take your pick from 13 colors to brighten up any space! Match this computer chair mat for carpet floors with any or the same color desk pads to complete your decor!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
